alert.note: Alert for Amite (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 30 at 5:22PM CDT until March 30 at 6:00PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 600 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN ST. HELENA...NORTHEASTERN EAST FELICIANA PARISHES IN SOUTHEASTERN LOUISIANA AND AMITE COUNTIES... At 522 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Liberty, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Clinton, Liberty, Centreville, Gloster, Wilson, Smithdale, Felps and Gillsberg. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CDT for southeastern Louisiana...and southern Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
